doc.field: Periodicals and pamphlets: Le Volontaire de la Liberté,No. 8 (Jul 1937); Letters from the Trenches from Our Boys in Spain; Two Years of American Aid to Spain: The Story of the Medical Bureau and North American Committee to Aid Spanish Democracy(1938?); Among Friends,Spring 1938 Map: Spain, notations in pen Original photos (2, color): ALB veterans marching in parade; Charles Nusser at French memorial to volunteers of International Brigades, Fuencarel, Spain (1983) Photocopied photographs of volunteers Clippings: International Brigades, various; a group labeled "pictures cut out from a book from the Franco Fascist Regime"
